name: Saviour of Oprea
description:
_- Can you change the Duchy of Oprea? -_
  • Saviour of Opera is a brand new 2D-platformer that was made for a final project in school. It was made by two persons, Rufus and Isak.
  • Experience the difficult choice of saving an entire duchy, or do the complete opposite, and recieve all the gold you want!
  • This is our first real game, and a lot of content had to be removed for time limits, so please bear with us until we learn everything!
  • Any found bugs may or may not be resolved and fixed, since we no longer have to work on this project.
Have fun and remember to comment if you like the game! - Rufus and Isak -Gryphos
